name: @1password/sdk
description: The 1Password JavaScript SDK offers programmatic read access to your secrets in 1Password in an interface native to JavaScript. The SDK currently supports `Node.JS`
author: 1Password

scripts.esm-example: npm run build --workspace client && npm run esm-example --workspace examples
scripts.commonjs-example: npm run build --workspace client && npm run commonjs-example --workspace examples
